file (GLOB SOURCE_FILES *.cpp *.h *.c)

add_library(SPIRV-Reflect ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_compile_definitions(SPIRV-Reflect PUBLIC SPIRV_REFLECT_USE_SYSTEM_SPIRV_H)
target_include_directories(SPIRV-Reflect SYSTEM PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include>)

install (DIRECTORY include/ DESTINATION ${DEST_THIRDPARTY_HEADERS_DIR}/ FILES_MATCHING PATTERN *.h)

if (NOT URHO3D_MERGE_STATIC_LIBS)
    install(TARGETS SPIRV-Reflect EXPORT Urho3D ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${DEST_ARCHIVE_DIR_CONFIG})
endif ()
